286060.「おや あなたは……\n 地上の英雄 <pc>さん ですね。\n 僕はオルガノさ:
Oh, you are... , the hero from the earth, aren't you? My name is Soil. I'm Mr. Organo's assistant.
I'm researching the Goddess Tree, but I can't seem to find the materials needed to make it grow...
You seem like you're really strong... if you don't mind, I'd like to ask for a favor on behalf of Mr. Organo.

286061.「こんにちは <pc>さん！\n 話は オルガノさんから うかがっています。\n:
Hello, ! Mr. Organo told me all about you.
Have you heard of something called the "Goddess Tree"?
The Goddress Tree is a mysterious plant that is said give power to those who grow it. However, no one has been able to do it...
It's said that the key to nuturing it lies in something called a "Geneseed".
So then, ! Would you be willing to help me grow the Goddess Tree? I'll do everything I can to help you!

286062.「そ そうですか……。それは残念です。\n もし <pc>さんの気が変わったら\:
I...I see... that's a shame. Well, if you
change your mind, please come talk to me
again.

286063.「わあっ ありがとうございます！\n では 研究用の庭を お貸しするので\n 扱:
Wow! Thank you so much! Now, I'm going to
lend you my research garden. I'll show you
how to use it.

286068.「<pc>さん。\n 女神の木のことなら 僕になんでも\n 聞いてください！\n:
<pc>. If you have any questions about
the Goddess Tree, please do not hesitate
to ask!
<bw_break>

286069.「あっ 聞いてください <pc>さん！ \n どうやら 女神の木が 時間を経て\:
Ah, , please listen! It seems that the Goddess Tree is altered over time, allowing for further growth.
The tree's biology is quite interesting, isn't it? Yes, yes... Let's go ahead and start growing for today! Now then...

286070.「さあ 何を ご希望ですか？\n<select_se_off>\n育てる\n庭の:
So, what can I do for you?
<select_se_off>
Grow
Change Garden Appearance
Review Growing

<select_end>
<close>

<select_end>

286072.「また いつでも 来てくださいね。\n <pc>さん！\n<end>:
You're welcome to come back any time,
<pc>!
<end>

286073.「どの 女神の木を 育てますか？\n<end>:
Which Goddess Tree do you want to grow?
<end>

286074.「すべての女神の木が 最大まで成長しているので\n 現在の 女神の木の状態を お:
Since all of the Goddess Trees are at their
growth maximum, I'll show you how they're
looking right now.
<end>

286075.「ああっ すみません。\n 今は <%sM_TREE_NAME>を これ以上\n:
Ah, I'm sorry. It seems that <%sM_TREE_NAME>
can't grow any further.
<end>

286076.「<%sM_TREE_NAME>は\n レベル<%nM_BEFORE_LEVEL:
<%sM_TREE_NAME> is in the process of growing from Level <%dM_BEFORE_LEVEL> to Level <%dM_AFTER_LEVEL>.
I apologize, but I can't make it grow any further until this process finishes. Please wait a little longer!

286077.「では 素材を お預かりしますね。\n ここに こうして…。\n<end>:
Okay, I'll take your materials. Just put these
here...
<end>

286078.「あれっ……？\n 残念ですが 成長に必要な素材が\n 足りないみたいです。\n:
Huh? I'm afraid you don't have enough
materials to start growing.
<end>

286080.<color_yellow>\n成長後に メニューを開きなおすことで\n最新情報:
<color_yellow>If you open this menu again after growing,
it will be updated with the latest
information.<end>

286081.「ふう…。これであとは 育ち終わるのを\n 待つばかりです！\n 他に どの女神:
Phew... Now all we have to do is wait for it
to finish growing! Any other Goddess Trees
that you'd like to grow?
<end>

286082.「どの見た目を 変更しますか？\n<end>:
Which appearance do you want to change?
<end>

286083.「<%sM_THEME_NAME>の見た目は どれにしますか？\n<end>:

to have?

Phew... I've changed it to "<%sM_PARTS_NAME>"!
This <%sM_THEME_NAME> is quite nice.
<me 71><bw_break>

286086.「何について 聞きたいですか？\n<select_se_off>\n女神の木とは:
What would you like me to explain?
<select_se_off>
Goddess Tree
Growth Materials
Garden Rank
Garden Creatures
<select_end>

286087.「この庭には 『女神の木』と呼ばれる木の苗が\n 全部で１０本 植えられています:
In this garden, there are ten seedlings of a tree called the "Goddess Tree".
The Goddess Tree is said to give power to those who grow it. That power depends on which tree is grown.
For example, growing the Strength Tree increases your Strength, and growing the Defense tree increases your Resilience.

286088.「これまでの研究によって\n 女神の木を育てるには パニガルムで手に入る\n 『:
Based on my research, I've concluded that in order for the Goddess Tree to grow, I need "Geneseeds" that come from Panigalm.
If you bring me any, I'll give them to the Goddess Tree to grow. So bring me as many as you can!

286089.「複数の女神の木が 全体的に成長していくと\n 研究用の庭 それ自体のランクが上:
As the number of multiple Goddess Trees grow overall, the research garden's rank itself increases. I call this its "Garden Rank".
It seems as the Garden Rank increases, the soil becomes more fertile, allowing trees that hit their limit to grow even further.
In other words, it's a good idea to try to grow all of your Goddess Trees in a balanced manner!

286090.「……あれっ？\n どうやら <%sM_TREE_NAME>に\n 何か変化が:
...Huh? It looks like the <%sM_TREE_NAME> has
changed somehow.
<end>

286091.<%sM_TREE_NAME>が\nレベル<%nM_BEFORE_LEVEL>か:
<%sM_TREE_NAME> has grown from Level <%dM_BEFORE_LEVEL> to
Level <%dM_AFTER_LEVEL> and your <%sM_KOUKA_NAME> has increased
by <%dM_KOUKA_NUM>!

286092.「女神の木が 成長して <pc>さんも\n さらに 強くなったみたいですね！\n:
The Goddess Tree has grown and it seems like you've gotten stronger, ! ...Huh?
Looks like the garden has changed!

286093.<pipipi_off>\n庭ランクが <%nM_BEFORE_RANK>から:
Garden Rank went from Rank <%dM_BEFORE_RANK> to Rank <%dM_AFTER_RANK>!
The Goddess Tree's level limit has been increased from Level <%dM_BEFORE_LEVEL> to Level <%dM_AFTER_LEVEL>!

286094.「わあっ どうやら 庭ランクが上がったことで\n 『<%sM_THEME_NAM:
Looks like the <%sM_THEME_NAME> appearance can
now be changed thanks to the Garden Rank
increasing!
<bw_break>

286095.「女神の木が 成長して <pc>さんも\n さらに 強くなったみたいですね！\n:
The Goddess Tree has grown and it seems like you've gotten stronger, ! At this rate... Huh?
It seems all of the trees have grown splendidly! Way to go, ! It's amazing.

286096.「女神の木が 成長して <pc>さんも\n さらに 強くなったみたいですね！\n:
The Goddess Tree has grown and it seems like
you've gotten stronger, <pc>!
Please keep up the good work!
<bw_break>

286097.「ああっ なんと……\n すべての女神の木が 最大まで成長しました。\n もう:
Oh, my...! All of the Goddess Trees have grown to their maximum. They can't grow any more!
I never thought the day would come where I'd see all of the Goddess Trees fully grown with my own eyes... I'm so happy!
It's all thanks to your efforts, . We raised them together, and I can't thank you enough.
As always, if you'd like to change the garden's look, please come and see me!

286098.「でも 僕の見立てでは 女神の木は まだまだ\n 成長する可能性を 秘めているは:
The way I see it, the Goddess Tree still has a lot of potential for growth...
Please be patient until the Goddess Tree grows to its next stage!

Seems like it will take about <%dL_HOUR> <%sL_HOUR_UNIT> <%dL_MIN> <%sL_MIN_UNIT> to grow. Is that all right?

288314.「おや すでに同じものを 取りつけていますよ。\n<end>:

You'd like to go over how to grow the Goddess
Tree? Understood!

288810.「研究用の庭には 不思議な生き物が\n 住み着いているようです。\n あれは い:
Looks like a strange creature has taken a liking to the research garden... I wonder what that's all about...?
Mr. Organo was wary that it might be a demon trying to destroy the garden, but I think it's just a spirit watching over the Goddess Tree.
More than anything, it's so cute and fluffy! I love the way it moves around!
Don't you think so too, ?

288867.「おや 源世植物研究所へ ようこそ。\n 僕はここで ある植物の研究をしているの:
Hello, welcome to the World Botany Research. I'm doing some research on a plant here, but it's not going so well...
Oh... is there a strong adventurer out there brave enough to traverse Panigalm...?
